gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰਗਟਿ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਬਿਬਿਚਾਰ ਕਰੈ ਗਨਿਕਾ ਪੈ ਤਾਹਿ ਲੋਗ ਬੇਦ ਅਰੁ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਕੀ ਨ ਕਾਨਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pragati Sansaar Bibichaar Karai Ganikaa Pai , Taahi Log Bayd Aru Giaan Kee N Kaani Hai ?
translation: A whore openly commits vice with other men. She has no regard and respect for the morality or code of conduct as laid down in social and religious books.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਲਾਬਧੂ ਛਾਡਿ ਭਰਤਾਰ ਅਾਨ ਦੁਅਾਰ ਜਾੲਿ ਲਾਛਨੁ ਲਗਾਵੈ ਕੁਲ ਅੰਕੁਸ ਨ ਮਾਨਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kulaabadhoo Chhaadi Bharataar Aan Duaar Jaai , Laachhanu Lagaavai Kul Ankous N Maani Hai ?
translation: But if a lady of respectable family goes to another man tarnishes the image of her family.

gurmukhi: ਕਪਟ ਸਨੇਹੀ ਬਗ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਅਾਨ ਸਰ ਫਿਰੈ ਮਾਨਸਰ ਛਾਡੈ ਹੰਸੁ ਬੰਸੁ ਮੈ ਅਗਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kapat Sanayhee Bag Dhiaan Aan Sar Dhirai , Maanasar Chhaadai Hansu Bansu Mai Agiaan Hai ?
translation: An egret with false love in his heart wanders from one pond to the other. But if someone belonging to the family of swans (Sikh of the Guru) leaves the Mansarover lake like congregation of the True Guru, that ignorant person is a big fool.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਪਰ ਤਨ ਧਨ ਲੇਪ ਨਿਰਲੇਪੁ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ ||੪੯੦||
transliteration: Gurmukhi Manamoukh Duramati Gurmati , Par Tan Dhan Layp Niralaypu Dhiaan Hai ?490?
translation: An obedient Sikh of the True Guru engrosses his mind in the consecrated words of wisdom of the True Guru, keeps himself unsullied by the evils of other's wealth and other's body. But one separated from the True Guru and worshipper of gods and goddesses, r
